main.name: Ashley Umetsu
main.description: I am currently a Full Stack Developer at Verizon. I love to build fully accessible apps utilizing ReactJS
main.bio: Hi, I'm Ashley! I love writing code and learning new things. I am self-motivated and work happily independently or with teammates. I am currently growing my skillset as a Full Stack Developer Apprentice at Verizon. Visit my LinkedIn or scroll down to learn more about my skills and experience and to check out some of my work!
main.contactmessage: If you are interested in contacting me about development opportunities please feel free to reach out to me via email or LinkedIn. I am looking forward to hearing from you!

resume.skillmessage: I am currently working with and developing my skills in the following technologies:

education.description: A 16 week program which helped me to develop my skills in HTML, CSS, JavaScript and Git.
I learned about the history, culture and politics of various East Asian countries and studied aborad in Japan for 1 year.

work.title: Full Stack Developer Apprentice
work.description: This is a 1 year apprenticeship program where I work hands on with a development team at Verizon. I am currently developing my skills in ReactJS and Docker with my current team.

work.title: Social Media Manager
work.description: I worked together with my clients to develop their social media presence for their businesses. This helped me to develop various soft skills like communication, adaptibility and working well independently.
